metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

extracted_sections.section_title: In a bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt.
In a shallow dish, whisk together eggs, milk, vanilla extract, and cinnamon.
In a blender, combine banana, Greek yogurt, almond milk, protein powder, and
1 pound boneless, skinless chicken thighs, cubed
Return chicken to the skillet and cook until heated through.
In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat.
Cook gnocchi according to package instructions, then drain.
o Bring water and butter to a boil.
o Mix flour, butter, water, and beaten egg to form a dough, then let rest.
o Drain on paper towels and serve.
o Scramble eggs in the same pan.
o Serve as a dip or side dish.

Beef Stroganoff Ingredients:  1 pound beef sirloin, thinly sliced 
 Place chicken in a baking dish, top with marinara sauce and shredded mozzarella cheese.  Bake for 20-25 minutes until cheese is melted and bubbly. 
 Sliced green onions for garnish Instructions:  In a bowl, mix soy sauce, mirin, sugar, sake, grated ginger, and minced garlic.
 Shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes, shredded cheese, sour cream, and salsa for toppings Instructions:  In a skillet, cook ground beef over medium heat until browned.
 2 cloves garlic, minced  Salt and pepper to taste 
 8 ounces rice noodles  1/2 pound shrimp or chicken 
 Bring to a simmer, then cover and transfer to the oven.  Cook for 2 hours, adding mushrooms, carrots, and pearl onions in the last 30 minutes. 
Instructions:  Season chicken breasts with salt and pepper, then dredge in flour.  In a large skillet, heat olive oil and butter over medium heat.
 2 large eggplants, sliced  1 cup breadcrumbs 
General Tso's Chicken Ingredients:  1 pound boneless, skinless chicken thighs, cubed 
 In the same skillet, cook ground lamb or beef, diced onion, and minced garlic until browned.  Stir in diced tomatoes, red wine, cinnamon, oregano, salt, and pepper.
 1 tablespoon grated ginger  1 can (14.5 ounces) diced tomatoes 
 1 pound ground beef  1/2 pound ground pork 
 Add shrimp, mussels, and cooked chicken, simmer for an additional 10 minutes until seafood is cooked and rice is tender.  Garnish with lemon wedges and serve.
 1 teaspoon thyme  1 teaspoon rosemary 

Ingredients:  4 chicken thighs  1 small onion, diced
 In a bowl, mix crab meat, diced onion, breadcrumbs, mayonnaise, beaten egg, Dijon mustard, Worcestershire sauce, and Old Bay seasoning.  Form mixture into patties.
 Cook fettuccine according to package instructions.  In a skillet, melt butter over medium heat. 

 In a bowl, mix yogurt, lemon juice, garlic, ginger, garam masala, turmeric, and cumin. Marinate chicken in the mixture for at least 1 hour.  In a skillet, melt butter over medium heat.

Acarajé  Ingredients: o 2 cups black-eyed peas o 1 small onion
o Add potatoes and cauliflower, stir to coat with spices. o Cover and cook until vegetables are tender, stirring occasionally. o Add salt to taste and serve. Albondigas 
 Instructions: o Form risotto into balls and stuff with a cube of mozzarella. o Dredge balls in flour, dip in beaten eggs, and coat with breadcrumbs. o Fry in hot oil until golden.
o Oil for frying  Instructions: o Mix grated cassava with coconut milk and salt. o Form mixture into flat cakes.

o 2 cloves garlic o 2 tablespoons soy sauce o 1 tablespoon sesame oil  Instructions:

o Add diced tomatoes, fish stock, wine, saffron, thyme, salt, and pepper, simmer for 20 minutes. o Add fish fillets, shrimp, and mussels, cook until seafood is done. o Serve hot with crusty bread. Bratkartoffeln (Fried Potatoes)
o 1 small onion o 2 cloves garlic o 1/4 cup parsley o 1 teaspoon cumin o 1 teaspoon cinnamon
o Pour in chicken broth and bring to a boil. o Reduce heat, cover, and simmer until bulgur is tender. o Stir in chopped parsley and salt. o Serve warm. Ca Tim Nuong (Grilled Eggplant)
o 2-3 Thai chilies o 2 tablespoons fish sauce o 2 tablespoons tamarind paste o 1 tablespoon sugar o 1/4 cup cilantro
o 1 small onion o 2 tomatoes o 1 jalapeño o 1/4 cup cilantro o 1 teaspoon salt
 Instructions: o Sauté diced onion, minced garlic, and sliced bell peppers in olive oil until softened. o Add diced tomatoes, cumin, paprika, and salt, simmer for 10 minutes.
o 2 tablespoons honey o 1 tablespoon rice wine o 1 teaspoon five-spice powder o 1 teaspoon garlic powder 
Churros  Ingredients: o 1 cup water o 1/2 cup butter
Cornbread  Ingredients: o 1 cup cornmeal o 1 cup flour
o 2 tablespoons butter  Instructions: o Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). o Spread béchamel sauce on 4 slices of bread.

o Rinse lentils and cook in water until tender. o Heat oil in a pan and sauté diced onion and minced garlic until translucent. o Add cumin, turmeric, coriander, and garam masala, cook for 1 minute. o Add cooked lentils and stir to combine. o Simmer for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
o 1/2 cup chopped cabbage o 1/4 cup chopped green onions o 2 cloves garlic o 1 tablespoon soy sauce o 1 teaspoon sesame oil
Egg Rolls  Ingredients: o 1 package egg roll wrappers o 1 cup shredded cabbage
o 1 teaspoon paprika o 1 teaspoon salt o Oil for frying  Instructions:
o Drain on paper towels and serve. Farofa  Ingredients: o 2 cups cassava flour

 Instructions: o Rinse split peas and cook in water until tender. o Sauté diced onion and minced garlic in olive oil until softened. o Blend cooked peas with onion, garlic, lemon juice, and salt until smooth.
o 1/4 cup olive oil o Rosemary o Sea salt  Instructions:
o 1/2 cup diced carrots o 2 eggs o 2 tablespoons soy sauce o 1 tablespoon sesame oil o 1/4 cup chopped green onions

o Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). o Slice baguette in half lengthwise. o Mix softened butter with minced garlic, chopped parsley, and salt. o Spread mixture on bread. o Bake for 10-15 minutes until golden.
o 1 package rice paper wrappers o 1/2 pound shrimp o 1/2 cup rice vermicelli o 1/2 cup lettuce o 1/4 cup mint

o Layer potatoes in the dish, seasoning with salt and pepper. o Mix cream, milk, and minced garlic, pour over potatoes. o Sprinkle with grated Gruyère cheese. o Bake for 45 minutes until golden and bubbly. o Serve warm.
o 1 small onion o 2 tomatoes o 1 teaspoon salt o 1 tablespoon chopped cilantro o 1 teaspoon minced garlic
o 2 cloves garlic o 4 tomatoes o 4 cups vegetable broth o 1 teaspoon cumin o 1 teaspoon coriander
Hummus  Ingredients: o 1 can chickpeas o 1/4 cup tahini
o 1/4 cup olive oil  Instructions: o Toss vegetables with minced garlic, jerk seasoning, and olive oil. o Roast at 400°F (200°C) until tender.
Kachumbari  Ingredients: o 4 tomatoes o 1 small onion
 Instructions: o Boil potatoes until tender, then dice. o Cook diced bacon until crispy, then remove and set aside. o Sauté diced onion in bacon fat until softened.

Mandazi  Ingredients: o 2 cups flour o 1/4 cup sugar
o Mix coconut milk with cooked rice and let sit for 10 minutes. o Serve rice with sliced mangoes. Mapo Tofu  Ingredients:
o 1 can diced tomatoes o 4 cups vegetable broth o 1 can cannellini beans o 1 cup pasta o 1/4 cup basil
Msemen  Ingredients: o 2 cups flour o 1 cup semolina
o Blend mashed eggplant, tahini, lemon juice, minced garlic, and salt in a food processor. o Slowly add olive oil while blending until smooth. o Serve with a drizzle of olive oil. Naan
o 2 cloves garlic o 1-2 Thai chilies o 1/4 cup water  Instructions:

o Remove from heat and stir in tapioca flour until smooth. o Let cool slightly, then mix in grated cheese and beaten eggs. o Form dough into balls and place on a baking sheet. o Bake for 20-25 minutes until golden. o Serve warm.

o Scramble eggs in the same pan. o Add noodles, fish sauce, tamarind paste, sugar, and lime juice, stir to combine. o Add bean sprouts, cooked shrimp, and chopped green onions. o Garnish with crushed peanuts and serve. Pajeon (Pancakes)
o 1 teaspoon salt o Skewers  Instructions: o Cut paneer into cubes.

o 4 tomatoes o 1 small onion o 1 jalapeño o 1/4 cup cilantro o 1 lime
o Stir in butter and Parmesan cheese. o Serve warm. Potato Salad  Ingredients:
o 1 carrot o 1/2 cup peas o 1 teaspoon cumin o 1 teaspoon coriander o 1 teaspoon turmeric

o Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C). o Cook bacon until crispy, then crumble. o Sauté diced onion in bacon fat until softened. o Place pie crust in a pie dish and sprinkle with bacon, onion, and cheese. o Beat eggs with cream, salt, and pepper, then pour over the filling.
o 1 teaspoon rosemary o 1/4 cup olive oil o 1 teaspoon salt  Instructions:
o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/4 cup olive oil o 4 cups chicken broth o 1/4 cup lentils o 1/4 cup cilantro
o Chill until set. o Serve with bread. Risotto  Ingredients:
o 1/4 cup vinegar o 1/4 cup sugar o 1/4 cup water o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/2 teaspoon pepper
